name: RacingOut
description:
Racing Out - is a action + racing game made in 48 hours for Mix and Game Jam.

In this game you need to destroy all cops, before they catch you. To destroy one car you need shoot two bullets.  Your score is amount of destroyed cops. You need to collect boxes of ammo to replenish supplies.

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • LMB or L.CTRL to shoot
  • R to reatart

The game was inspired  by GTA 1 and GTA 2.
